name: The BlackThornProd Game JAM paradox
description:
So i'm just a 15 years old who tried to make a game and... Well... Here it is

...i'm not happy with the result...

The game (if you can call this a game) is very short, and pretty much bad in every way possible! The main thing that stopped me was high school!!!

Hope you enjoy it!!!

Made with javascript

I made everything myself, except jquery and the videos!
